Translations.Text: That truly to the fearing and obeying (is) a success/triumph
Fenced gardens and grapes
And full grown breasts and same age/not aging
And a cup filled to the rim
They do not hear/listen in it nonsense/senseless talk and nor lying
Reimbursement from your Lord a gift/grant account
The skies`/space`s and the earth`s/Planet Earth`s and what (is) between them (B)`s Lord, the merciful, they do not own/possess from Him an address/conversation (they can not talk to Him)
A day/time the Soul/Spirit and the angels stand (in) a row/arranged , they do not speak/talk ,except who the merciful permitted/allowed for him, and he said right/correct
That (is) the day/time, the real/true/just , so who willed/wanted took/received to his Lord a return
We (E), We warned/gave you notice of (a) near/close torture, a day/time the human/man looks (to) what his two hands advanced/undertook , and the disbeliever says: "Oh, if only I was dust/earth
And/by the strangers/life extractors , exaggerating/absorbing (violently)
And/by the active/pullers , actively/pulling
And/by the ships/stars/fast (could be angels), tending to the livelihood/floating
So the racing/surpassing/preceding, racing/surpassing/preceding
So the regulators/arrangers/planners (of) a matter/affair/order/command
A day/time the first blow of the horn trembles and shakes/agitates
The followed closely behind follows it
Hearts (on) that day (are) palpitating/pounding
Its eyesight/understanding (is) humble/submissive
They say: "Are we returning (E) in the first creation
Is (it that) if we were decayed/decomposed bones
They said: "That is then a loosing repetition
So but it is one deterrent/cry to drive out
So then they are at the Earth`s surface
Did Moses` information/speech come to you
